website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for warm and fashionable leg warmers with an affordable price tag, these comfy knit crochet socks are a great deal overall.
pros: Earns rave reviews for its classic style and cotton blend material
These leg warmers feature a soft knit construction that makes any outfit look more fashionable without the added bulk
cons: A number of consumers caution that these socks tend to slide down a bit when walking

customer_reviews.title: Love Them! They Actually Stay Up!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these socks! They are amazing quality, very comfortable, and they fit very well. The best part: they actually stay up on their own! Most of the thigh high socks I have bought do not do this, so I was happily surprised. They are well worth the money. They hold their color very well, and look great even though I have washed them multiple times. They work with a lot of outfits. These are simply my favorite pair of thigh high socks that I own, despite the fact that they were the cheapest. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Oliviabettyrain

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: The socks fit perfectly! I am 5'4" and have very chubby 28" thighs, they still go all the way up and stay up! :) 10/10 would reccommend these for chubby girls looking for thigh high socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to buy more!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping these would fit my thunder thighs! More importantly because I have muscle atrophy I was worried about a noticeable different fit. They go high and roll down still above knee for me I'm 5'3
customer_reviews.author: IslandGirlHandmades

customer_reviews.title: They fit big thighs!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 7, 170 lbs and a size medium/sz 10. I have big legs and was skeptical about the thigh fit. These fit me perfectly! Love them and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: LOOK NO FURTHER IF YOURE TALL
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best stockings I’ve found. I’ve been on the bunt for months to find the right length for how tall I am and the level of comfort. Take advantage of the time I’ve spend and stop looking. These are it! I bought the black ones and I’m about to order every color. I’m 5’10 slender build, 156 pounds. They are a little tight around the thigh but it doesn’t make your legs look like sausage and it’s not uncomfortable. It’s the right amount. In the first picture, I have them rolled down about two inches. In the second one, they are all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, and pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, but they are about the thickness of a man's dress sock -- not exactly "chunky" socks. I ordered a small, and I'm about 5'6" and a size 2. They fit well, and come up above the knees. They're also pretty soft (not amazingly so, but still nice against the skin), and overall really comfortable. I've been pairing them with knee-high boots, and they look very cute. Once again though -- these aren't thick socks. If you're looking for the chunky look, find something else. If you like them thinner, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRed

customer_reviews.title: Decent socks, kind of pricey though
customer_reviews.text: I really like these socks, they're thick enough to be warm and thin enough to be worn under boots. I like how they go just over the knee but can be cuffed at the top over boots for a finished look. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Late-Twenties

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than expected, but had to pull them up constantly.
customer_reviews.text: I put these on at 10am and purposely didn’t adjust them all day. At 8pm after walking around and getting up and down many times, they only slipped a couple of inches. So I ordered more! I can say the Wine has more brown that purple in it, but it’s still nice. For reference I’m 5’5” and 118. UPDATE: I washed them in cold water and line dried them. I wore them a second time today, and pulled them up all day long. I’m especially disappointed because I purchased (and already washed) two more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I have somewhat chunky legs but by no means fat (I'm 5'2 and 130). These can't go above my knees because they're too tight if they go past. You might want to find a stretchier, comfier brand. I'm probably going to return them. If you have skinny legs this might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3"/116 lbs. Usually thigh highs give me huge muffin top on my legs and these hardly do at all. I have sensitive skin and wish they were softer but they aren't itchy enough to send back. They almost go all the way up my leg if they aren't folded. Definitely keep my legs warm, and my boyfriend loves when I wear them. They dont' stay up as well as Id like them too but most thigh highs don't. Going to buy them in some more colors I think. Good socks for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Kara Lyke

customer_reviews.title: Too damn tight!
customer_reviews.text: Unreal how tight these were. I agree, they won't fall down, they just made my legs hurt so bad after wearing them I couldn't wait to take them off! My legs are not large either, that's why I thought these would be great...oh no, I was wrong. They're also incredibly thin. So thin that I could see my skin through the material. I won't be buying these again...buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Anne~1536

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! I'm 5"10 and thin wit a dive 9-10 shoe and thoes socks come a little about my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'9" and these were just to the knee on ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9" and these were just to the knee on me. Still cute as knee highs although I wanted thigh high.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Best thigh socks for tall girls!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9 and 145 lbs, thighs a little on the thicker side. These are the only thigh high socks on amazon that seem to come up 4-5 inches past my knee! They also aren’t too tight, and don’t squeeze my leg too much and make that unflattering indent in the thigh. Because they’re not super tight they do need to be pulled up sometimes if you’re speed walking, but not if you have thigh high boots on. Also, after wearing them with rubber boots that tended to rub against my skin a lot they did develop a hole in the ankle - but that was more of a boots problem than a sock problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Herman

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: super cute and super long... i'm 5'11 and they were tall enough i had to fold the top down. i normally wear a size 10 in pants and they were plenty big. probably big enough for someone up to a 14/small 16 thigh.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks so much!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks sooo so much!!! I needed them for a cosplay to dye blue originally but ended up wearing them bc I lost my other white otks. I plan on rebuying the white pair for my cosplay along with the maroon, navy, & coffee pairs. They scrunch down a little bit over all stay up! I was wearing tights though that probably helped. Sock Dreams makes a sock glue if you need it or just get some fashion tape if they don’t stay up on you! The quality of the socks are nice and thick, warm, & cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Leggings
customer_reviews.text: Color as described and long enough to go up to mid thigh. I am 5ft 8inches tall. Stays up all day. Warm and comfortable> I'm wearing them as I write this review to stay warm on a cold day here. Great value will buy more now that I ran them thru wearing and washing many times.
customer_reviews.author: April O.

customer_reviews.title: I looove these socks. They are the first knee-highs ...
customer_reviews.text: I looove these socks. They are the first knee-highs that do not muffin-top my thighs (average thickness) but also stay on! I pulled them up once or twice throughout the day as is to be expected, but overall these socks had a really high-quality look and feel for a fraction of the price I'm used to seeing. I received a ton of compliments on my outfit and I'm planning on buying a backup pair. They are SO soft! I was really blown away by how much nicer they look and feel than I was expecting. The care instructions do say to hand-wash, so i expect putting them in the washing machine would change the feel really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: No stretch, itchy material
customer_reviews.text: Not stretchy, not soft, made of some itchy warm material, very uncomfortable. I was really disappointed with these socks, they can’t even fit over my knees (even the kneecap really challenges this sock) and I am not overweight at all. They look frumpy and feel cheap so overall I would say I am not happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised by the great quality of these given the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the great quality of these given the price! They are very long with a somewhat stretchy opening for those of us with moderately thick thighs. If your thighs are very thick and you're apprehensive about buying before trying, I might suggest looking elsewhere for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: aerostar

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, but kind of short for my long legs. Shorter people will find them to be plenty long enough. I am five feet ten inches tall, and these barely reach above my knees. They are soft and comfortable, though. They keep my legs warm in the winter nights, and they look very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure my wife would look just the the model in the picture...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife because she is cold all the time and I thought these would look sexy on her. I haven't seen her wear them yet, but then again, I never see her wear anything I've bought her. Maybe I lack style. Then again, maybe I have excellent style and she lacks it. Just sayin'. I think my sweatpants look awesome with my Muck Boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit the girls with bigger legs, love these! I don't have skinny legs, more athletic and these socks fit so nice up to my above my knees Perfect for winter, they keep my legs warm and look nice if you wanted to wear them with boots and a dress. I ordered these in most of the colors offered. Love these socks.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these twice, notably the first pair was much better than the second. (Both are great!) They do roll down a bit, I would suggest wearing these socks for spring/summer/early fall weather, as it is not thick enough to keep you generally warm during cold days. I have big thighs and they go over with a bit of struggling and adjusting. I am 5’6 and these do fit length wise. I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE LONNNNNG
customer_reviews.text: Short girls beware lol. I'm 5"8 135 lbs and these stretched well past my knees haha!! They are most certainly thigh-high, which is exactly what is hopes for!!! Shorter girls, these will probably reach up to your cooter so keep that in mind. They are very nicely made and a beautiful soft gray. Would 10/10 recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Zora Rockeymoore

customer_reviews.title: I did see other people say they fit great so I was hoping they were more flexible so ...
customer_reviews.text: The socks aren't very well made, the stitching was frayed right out of the package on one but hey they don't cost much so I didn't expect much. I also play soccer during summer and snowboard during winter so my legs are very meaty and thick so I kinda expected them to be tight. I did see other people say they fit great so I was hoping they were more flexible so they would fit any sized leg but they are not very giving. They do stretch just very little and it kinda makes me feel like they are going to break any second. I would recommend if you want something cheap but looks like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Cable knit is thick enough without making your feet sweaty. Cotton and easily washable both a plus. Color very true to image. I’ll buy more at this price. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Only One Mommy

customer_reviews.title: cute! fabric a little thin
customer_reviews.text: im around 5'3 and 130 lbs and these fit me perfectly! they came up to about mid thigh, maybe 4-6 inches or so above my knee, theyre quite comfortable and dont really fall down too much, my only real complaint is that the fabric is a little thinner than i expected. one thing to note is that these are somewhat stretchy but not super stretchy so if you have larger thighs id worry they may dig in at the very top, so keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: kur0mizu

customer_reviews.title: Eh Socks \:
customer_reviews.text: Eh. They were kinda see-through and stiff/scratchy. They dont stay up at all, and quickly stretch out and fall down, (even on me, with normal thickness legs!). They arent super high for being thigh highs and garters were necessary to wear them. Not the best socks I ever had. At the same time I bought 'Sock It To Me OTK cable knit socks' in black and they ARE SO MUCH BETTER! Way longer and softer, way less see-through and they stay up even without garters for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Tights AND Super-Helpful Seller
customer_reviews.text: I give these tights 5 stars for quality and for being warm and pretty, all things I was looking for in a tight. I also give 5 stars for the seller. She was super to work with in resolving a problem I had with my order. I came away with a feeling that she genuinely cared about helping me.
customer_reviews.author: Erica F.

customer_reviews.title: Thicc thigh ladies
customer_reviews.text: If you have thicc thighs, fear not, these still will look good on you. Usually I can’t find thigh high boots that fit me. I’m 5’4” and 140lbs with a good amount of my weight sitting in my thighs. If this sounds like you, just get the dang socks bro. You’ll look hot
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Very nice over the knee socks
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Very warm when the temperature gets cold. Long enough to help keep the cold out. Very comfortable and non-itchy. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. They come up just above my knees. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I bought a grey pair and a black pair and they're both amazing, the colors are true to what you see. These don't slip down or require you to pull them up all the time. They go to about my mid thigh, but I'll probably be rolling them down a little so the top can be seen from my skirt. The picture I have shows me wearing them with a skirt, but I revealed one leg so you could see where it comes to. (I am 5'8" and 110 lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Ok..kinda tight not very thick, ride down as I walk
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to be thicker. They also ride down my legs and are just a tad tight. They fit but not as I want them too. I’m 5’7 135lbs and wanted really thick warm socks to wear with shorts lounging and these dont impress. I’m gonna look for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Handel

customer_reviews.title: ... stay up on your legs without making you look like a sausage exploding from it's skin
customer_reviews.text: These stay up on your legs without making you look like a sausage exploding from it's skin. Love wearing these out to the bars during the winter, for my cosplays, around the house, and just about every other time I have an excuse to wear them. Thick enough not to have weird holes in the knitting, but also not too thick where you have to buy your shoes a size up. Hands down favorite knee highs I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Keaney

customer_reviews.title: Love them, though could use just a tad bit more practical improvements 😉  💕
customer_reviews.text: Could use a couple more inches in length, and just a smidgen more give at the top, otherwise scrumptious for my feet, ankles, calves and knees. -- this is why I'd like more length and give, so that the top, fold over of "cuff" isn't laying directly under in the bend of my knees, a couple inches higher up the thigh would be marvelous!😉💖
customer_reviews.author: Grams

customer_reviews.title: These socks are great and fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great and fit me perfectly. I fold them down just above my knee and they stay there all day. These socks are the perfect thickness as well and keep my legs nice and warm on those cold days and they are thin enough to wear on the warmer days. They are super soft and feel great and if I knew they were going to be this nice I would have bought more of them in different colors. I got the tan and the white and now wich I had the black. My legs are average size and they are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Betker

customer_reviews.title: These are more like a super-long trouser sock than they are a women's ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the gray. First, not the AnVei-Nao brand was received. These are much lighter in weight than the picture shows. I would say the content is more polyester than it is cotton. There's no loft to the yarn. These are more like a super-long trouser sock than they are a women's over the knee sock. Super disappointed that what was shipped & received is nowhere near what is shown.
customer_reviews.author: katieok

customer_reviews.title: They do not stay up. :(
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in these. They may work for some legs, but not mine. I wish that I would have worn them as soon as they arrived so that I could have determined if they were going to work for me. Unfortunately, I waited too long, and the window to return these long socks has closed. They simply start to slide down after walking a few steps. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They do come down when they are too high on my thighs, but they sit perfectly just a couple inches above the knee. They are very comfortable as well, and cute with skirts and shorts!
customer_reviews.author: Scattered Neurons

customer_reviews.title: Great for hospital and during delivery!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used these while delivering my baby. I wanted something to keep my feet and legs warm during my delivery. There's were awesome!!! I wish I would have thought about this with my first baby! My legs we nice and toast in that cold hospital and I felt somewhat covered up which was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stretchy but don't loose shape and fall down
customer_reviews.text: These fit so well and are so comfy! Nice and stretchy but don't loose shape and fall down. I have slightly thicker legs and they work perfectly for me. Could possibly be a little loose if you have pencil thin legs.
customer_reviews.author: Eh

customer_reviews.title: So cute :3
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so cute. They are a little shorter than the picture and i am only 5'2" but I am also a little heavier than the picture so that probably accounts for the length. I am 125lbs. But these are realy comfy and I do love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I always struggle to find comfy thigh high socks because a lot of them feel too tight- and like they're cutting off circulation! These socks fit my expectations of what a real comfy and thick (good quality) sock should be. I recently ordered the Navy color, and already own the Black and Dark Gray. I love them because they stay on without feeling too pressured. They are also good quality, totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ChiCityGal

customer_reviews.title: A-Okay For Cosplay
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Triss (Witcher 3) cosplay and they worked great! Of course I had to mod them some for the cosplay, but even before that they fit great and felt amazing when on - and they looked great both ways as well! 10/10 for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: High quality and soft, but they dont stay up!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so cute and warm! Very high quality but they dont stay up on their own. I have to constantly pull them back up while im out, but thats okay with me since they are so cute :) these are my second pair and im going to continue buying more just to have them to wear around the house often! At first they are a little rough/itchy, but after awhile i barely notice the feel anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5" 124lbs wayyy to small! The title say "Womens Girls" back to back. 2 thoughts were ... 1) You would have to been ill and dangerously skinny as a WOMAN to wear these. 2) 'Girls' in the case of describing clothing, is a pretty young age to market photos of stockings that are made to look sexy to.
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: ... and they don't go as high as I would like. I can't use my guarder belt with them ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8 and they don't go as high as I would like. I can't use my guarder belt with them with my dress that hangs just shigh of my knee. they are everything they claim to be. they aren't to tight but hey easily stay just below my knee after two or three days of use. I really think you should buy them. they come on time and my three sets were package in a brown envelope unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: C cfeld

customer_reviews.title: Too itchy
customer_reviews.text: Super itchy and do not stretch as much as most of the reviewers say. I don't know if they're only mine or if they have other styles and I bought the unstreachable type but mine are small and tight. I do have thick calves but this too much. Now, regarding the itchiness, I would recommend you to wear them over pants, tights or leggings and not by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Akane

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Wear.
customer_reviews.text: These thigh highs are AWESOME, LOVES them :) Keeps the legs warm, stays up and they are soooo cute. Great quality, holds up after washing's, no shrinking and again super cute. I will be ordering more for sure :) No worries of pulls or snags and I LOVE the sweater like material. They give a really cure preppy look, they stay up all day too which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: most great, BLACK COLOR IS LESSER PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought several pairs of these in dirrerent colors. The maroon and grey were great, fit wonderfully even for someone with slightly thicker thighs. The black pair were a completely different product and after reading other reviews it seems I'm not the only one. First two colors were knit, had more give and longer length, the black pair were cheaper material, only came to just sbovey knees and fit much tighter. I gave the black pair away but I'll probably order more of the knit ones in wine and grey.
customer_reviews.author: Aventura

customer_reviews.title: Yessir, they are quite nice...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the wife mostly because I think thigh high socks like these are pleasing to the eyes if you get what I'm throwing out there. She loves them as well, she says they are warm and cozy, I think they look warm and cozy but I'm not one to wear thigh high socks, I'm not that weird. So anyway, they fit her perfect and she is 5'11". Get a pair for your girl, you won't be sorry, and she will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: TheGrandSyphor

customer_reviews.title: Not thigh highs!
customer_reviews.text: Not thigh highs. Not long enough. They fit 'like over the knees'. I am 5'10 with very long legs, if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Global Girl

customer_reviews.title: I want more!
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and sexy. So far I've only warn them once but they will be a staple in my wardrobe. I'm 5' 3", 160 lbs and somewhere between a 10 and a 12. They fit my legs well and didn't make them bulge. They slid down a little but it wasn't too bad. I just pulled them up a few times during the day. I wore the dark brown with brown boots and a brown corduroy skirt. I received a ton of complements. I'm ready to buy more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: D. Torre

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be a knit sock. They are more like thick panty hose or "trouser sock" material. They are shorter than in the picture and as described. They do not go over my knee. I wore them up to my knees and they were so tight around the top they cut off the circulation. I have average sized legs. Not plus size. All the other reviews that I read describing that they will fit "thick thighs" made me believe they would fit fine. They do not. At least at 3 bucks, they can go in the trash and I don't feel too bad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot socks.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for fashionable tall boots. My wife has complained about not having good socks to fill her boots up and not fall by the end of the day. These were just the ticket to get her to quit complaining. I love them and she loves them. She says that they are not to warm and they have not shrunk yet after several washings. Will buy her more as soon as the weather turns cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for bigger thighs
customer_reviews.text: If you have any sort of thighs besides sticks these will probably cut off your circulation in them. I got them up and on but it was a struggle. I ended up bunching them up as knee highs and they were still cute. Cant complain for free shipping and the like $3 I spent on them. I wasnt expecting much as everything is normally made for skinny girl thighs. Or even just normal thighs. Deal-able for the price
customer_reviews.author: cassie p

customer_reviews.title: Two different Styles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both Grey and Wine Red. The wine red is a beautiful color; I'm 5'6" 130lbs and they fit up to my thighs (which is really nice). The grey ones are different; they're thinner and have a different pattern and lighter color than shown in the picture. They're noticeably shorter than the Wine Red pair, but not unappealingly so. They still go just over my knees and are definitely cute. I will order more colors as I love long socks and the Wine Red pair's style was definitely more than I expected for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: good good good
customer_reviews.text: soft and sweater-like material! it was warm but not too hot and mostly stayed up well!! i had to adjust them sometimes and they were a little tight on my thighs, but overall good!!
customer_reviews.author: kaz

customer_reviews.title: Being a bigger girl it always makes me sad when my knee high socks won't go past my ...
customer_reviews.text: Being a bigger girl it always makes me sad when my knee high socks won't go past my calves but these! Omg I can't tell you how happy I am with these socks. They go all the way up to the middle of my thigh! They're wonderful! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: justice crouch

customer_reviews.title: Good price, stay up reallh well
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and long. (I expected them to be thicker!) They do stay up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Murray

customer_reviews.title: Tight and loose?
customer_reviews.text: So I figured these would be oerfect, they're thigh high socks and putting them on they were super tight around my thighs. I'm 5'4 and 130 lbs. Anyway, not even a minute after walking they start to fall down. There's no exaggeration here, I tried to wear them yesterday to class and had to hold them u because they faoo down so easily! Would return, but the window is closed. DO NOT RECOMMEND! How do you screw up socks?! Extremely disappointed, would rate 0/5 of I could.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Rae

customer_reviews.title: You can't return them
customer_reviews.text: Would not have bought them had I known I couldn't return them. I was putting together a Halloween costume and bought multiple options with the intention of keeping one and returning the others. Apparently these aren't eligible for return, however I don't see this written anywhere on the listing. Annoyed that I just got shorted $10 or however much I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit me like a Thigh hi. They are cozy, they wash well and they stay up pretty good. I have skinny legs so any brand of these will tend to slide a bit and I have to pull them up a few times a day. But with my tall boots and midi skirts these work well and I can get away without any stockings or tights!
customer_reviews.author: Ladyberg

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't wear things like this, but these were so cheap I had to get them. The material so far is great. It doesn't seem cheaply made. They are very comfortable. For me, the top is a bit tight, but I also have bigger thighs so it's expected. They are still very comfy though and soft! I like them and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moss

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. Have been worn and washed a handful of times so far and still look fairly new. They are tall enough to reach above my knees (I'm 5'7") but they eventually fall down to mid-knee level while I'm walking, but they don't fall all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: JDelph

customer_reviews.title: Alright for small legs
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would chance it and see if these would fit because I can not find thigh high socks in my size. I wear a size 10 or 12 in pants. I got the sock about half way up my thigh before it did not go any further. The rest of the sock other than the very top would have fit. The knit pattern is cute. Would be a nice sock on a smaller thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay up very well
customer_reviews.text: These at least are the same height as in photo unlike the AM Landen Thigh Highs. But they don't stay up that high as I wear them. I'm short and slight and end up a few inches above my knees. I frequently have to pull them up. They feel OK, not soft but not too harsh, nice texture.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: I thought these were going to be sheer tights material but they are thick and almost like a knitted material- which is even better
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I thought these were going to be sheer tights material but they are thick and almost like a knitted material- which is even better! They go up to my thigh (I'm 5'5") and are comfy! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Malkin

customer_reviews.title: did not stay put
customer_reviews.text: does not stay on my thighs. Color and material very good. One sock was way tighter at the top but and barely went up my thigh but still did not stay put. Can't use as expected but will make decent knee highs for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: and so far I like them. They are comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in both black and white. I have had them for a little over two works, and so far I like them. They are comfortable and warm. I live in Michigan, so warm is very important. I am about 4'11", and they are thigh high for me, actually go up higher than I need them to. They do slip down while walking, but that's nothing a garter can't fix. Overall, I am happy them.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, super warm and cute. I’ve got kind of a curvy figure (5’ 6” 150 lbs) and thick legs so I was glad they fit so well. Super tight thigh highs don’t work on me but these were just right.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE SO COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I've been looking for thigh high socks for awhile and these are exactly what I was looking for. Leaving them completely unrolled comes up to my mid-thigh. They're not entirely soft per say but they are very comfortable and do keep me warm. ^^ *DISCLAIMER* I'm 154 cm/61 in/ 5' 1" in height. And I weigh about 87-88 lbs (39 kg). Should this help for some who want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable.... But, if you have somewhat chunky thighs, ya know, like not super model legs.... Then be prepared for them to basically just come to your knees... Which does NOT look sexy. BOO
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Become saggy knee-highs/leg warmers when walking
customer_reviews.text: I would give these 3.5 stars because while they're really comfy, they slip off my legs way too easily when I walk. I'm 5"2 and 115 pounds, but my legs are shorter than my torso. So when I wear these, they cover almost my entire leg. Despite them almost covering my leg, I walk maybe 5 minutes and they fall to where it looks like I'm wearing saggy knee-high socks (almost like saggy leg warmers). I'm not very thick, but I'm not super skinny either, so these socks were okay for me, but not as great as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: High quality socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought three thigh high socks in different colors for fall season to match my outfits and they all look good and kept me warm.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: great for all seasons!
customer_reviews.text: these took a little while to come in the mail but once they did I loved them! I wear a lot of dresses and they look great with all of them. you can wear these any season and they always look stylish. I like to wear them with my small ankle boots the best. they give an average look a more sexy edge.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good for shorter girls
customer_reviews.text: My GF is 6' and loves her boots, so I got her a pair of these to wear under her skirts/dresses to keep her warm. Ads say thigh high, but they stopped just north of her knees, so she rolled them down and wore them like boot socks. If you are over 5'6", these may not be as long as you think. Fit and material are otherwise nice and they kept her warm.
customer_reviews.author: A.S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: They fit me best without sliding if I fold them down just under ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I would have issues. I'm 5'6" with large calves and thighs. They fit me best without sliding if I fold them down just under my knee which looks good too. Greater quality than I would have guessed. Well worth it. I plan to get more for me and as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: My calves and thighs are on the bigger side (16" ...
customer_reviews.text: My calves and thighs are on the bigger side (16" and 21" around the top of the knees) and most thigh highs don't even fit over my large calves or just squishes it too much. I was pleasantly surprised on its fit and it didn't slip too much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them, still holding up well after a year of wear!
customer_reviews.author: TSM

customer_reviews.title: great quality but were too big :(
customer_reviews.text: i wouldve totally given this better stars if it fit better im a fairly tiny girl, 5'4 115lbs and theyre huge on me :( but the quality was soo good i wish they fit me becayse theyre super soft. only downside is they squeezed my thighs really tight but didnt fit the rest of my leg and kept falling down :( also they were super long!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Bungert

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 2/3 or a size 25/26 european sizes and these are fitted/somewhat snug on my and I have pretty small thighs
customer_reviews.text: They fit small but per the other reviews I am a small frame and so they fit as expected with that in mind but there is no way these are one size fits all! I wear a size 2/3 or a size 25/26 european sizes and these are fitted/somewhat snug on my and I have pretty small thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson BeDunnah

customer_reviews.title: Great thigh highs!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They're cute and they fit really well. Something I will warn is that they shrink a bit in the wash. My thighs are relatively small so I that didn't really impair them but you may want to hang them to dry. I recently used these for an outdoor theatre event in which I was in a very hot 1820's dress and they were a relief, I'm so glad I had these instead of tights
customer_reviews.author: Emorie

customer_reviews.title: I love these to sleep:)
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5”2” , they fit long but ok to fold. I hav slim legs , it fits me perfect. Medium to think material. I would buy me the black ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi💙

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality. Nice and soft. Only strange thing is the black pair fit perfectly, came up a bit past my knees like I wanted but the gray and white pair came up to the middle of my thighs. I’m 5’2. 108.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Day

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for tall girls
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I am 5 foot 9 and has long legs and I wish they were a little higher they go right to the Nissan me otherwise they're great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 80% Cotton Nor Warm for Winter. Thin & Synthetic Summer Wear Only.
customer_reviews.text: Not 80% Cotton. Feels like all nylon/polyester. Even a bit see-through when on. Definitely not thick nor warm. Do not buy for winter. :( Tight on my legs/thighs and I'm 5'4" and 108 lbs. :( They look waaaay too pinchy on my thin thighs. This is embarrassing and physically uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: EarthFreak

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, stays up and very long
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, stays up and very long. I am 5'5" with 34 inch leg inseam and these socks hit upper thigh. Not too thick or thin fabric, and find that they keep my legs nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: CASEY CASALE

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife for an early X-mas present. She loves them. She works in downtown Chicago and takes the train. These help her survive the daily trip during the winter. She also uses them for watching movies in the basement sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Phat n Stoopid

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Repurchased this after losing my last pair, last time I didn't receive a pattern. Both were thick and warm, and went up to my mid thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves them.
customer_reviews.text: He goes crazy for them. I’m 5’2” and they go all the way up to underneath my butt. Later on I’m planning on buying other colors in them. They are also super comfortable not as soft as you would expect tho. A little bit more corse than I would’ve liked. But otherwise good pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Roberts

customer_reviews.title: They were comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" and these socks only barely went over my knees. They were constantly falling down below my knee all day, I even tried folding the top for extra support but it didn't work. They were comfortable to wear, but as far as what I wanted them for, they didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: H.K.

customer_reviews.title: So cute.
customer_reviews.text: This did take what seemed like forever to receive but they fit perfectly. These socks are not too thick or thin, so they can be worn both in winter and summer. They come up to my mid thighs, I am 5'1' though so keep that in mind, they are very stretchy so be careful if you are very tall, you may want to buy a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6" tall and these socks reach up a few inches aboves my knees. The fabric is comfortable and these socks keep my legs warm. The label reads "free size" and it just fits fine. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrinalini

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep my legs warm
customer_reviews.text: These go all the way legs. In winter I like to wear under my pants and they do an excellent job keeping me warm. In the summer I wear them with a tank top and run around the house pants less which keeps my husband happy. I also bought a few pairs for my 17 year old daughter who had foot surgery. They helped keep her one leg warm until the cast came off.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: They go up to mid-thigh if I don't fold them over like the image photo
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Halloween costume and I was worried they wouldn't be long enough on me - I'm 5'8" and 120lbs with really long legs. They fit PERFECTLY. They go up to mid-thigh if I don't fold them over like the image photo, and they don't slide down at all when I'm walking around. They're great quality too. I got the burgundy/maroon color and the color is really bold, and they are a warm, soft, knit material. At $9 they were seriously a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. Keeps me warm. I am planning on buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Y.

customer_reviews.title: True high thighs on a 5'2 frame!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2, 128 lbs with most my weight around my hips and thighs and these are by far the best pair of high thigh socks I own! I roll them down so I don't get the thigh muffin top look!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

product_meta.title: AnVei-Nao Womens Girls Winter Thigh High Socks Over Knee Knit Socks Cotton Leg Warmers
feature_bullets: Very Soft Feel and Classic style
very warm and fashionable to wear
